EmailTemplate.name: SCHEDULING APPOINTMENTS EMAIL/If Customer shows interest
EmailTemplate.subject: Scheduling Attorney and Tax Consultations by Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was a pleasure speaking with you today. You indicated you are interested in speaking with a plan attorney or tax consultant. You may address issues like tracking business expenses, complying with state and local laws, and tax issues. Call me directly at 877-808-1908 X5271 and I can help you set up a consultation, or if you prefer, you may schedule an appointment online by following the instructions below.
To Schedule an Attorney Consultation:
1. Login to LegalZoom.com via this link: https://www.legalzoom.com/LZWeb/Welcome/SignIn.aspx?TIMESTRING=&iProcess= 2. Under "Existing Member," enter in your email address and password, and click submit. If you do not know your account password, you can request a password reset email on the sign-in page. 3. Once on your account page, click on the grey "Business Advantage" tab. 4. Click on "Request an Attorney Consultation." 5. Complete the short survey and submit. 6. Click on the orange "Schedule a Consultation" button. 7. Select an attorney and click on the "View Schedule" link on the right. 8. Scroll down to view the attorney's availability. The available times are displayed in white. 9. Click on your desired appointment time. Then click on "Make Appointment." 10. You will receive a confirmation email with your appointment details.
To Schedule a Tax Consultation:
1. Login to LegalZoom.com via this link: https://www.legalzoom.com/LZWeb/Welcome/SignIn.aspx?TIMESTRING=&iProcess= 2. Under "Existing Member," enter in your email address and password, and then submit. If you do not know your account password, you can request a password reset email on the sign-in page. 3. Once on your account page, click on the grey "Business Advantage" tab. 4. Click on "Schedule a Tax Consultation." 5. Scroll down to view the calendar and select a date. The available dates are in bold print. 6. Under "Appointment Time," click on the dropdown button to view available times. 7. Complete the "Question or Topic for Discussion" box. You may also upload any documents for the tax professional to review by clicking the "Browse" button. 8. Enter in your contact telephone number. 9. Click the orange "Submit" button. 10. You will receive a confirmation email with your appointment details.
Best Regards,
[Account Manager] [ext.XXXX] Account Management Services T: 877-808-1918, M-F 9:00 am – 6 pm PT
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
